title.rendered: Five Reasons To Get Juvas Ceiling Fans This Summer

content.rendered:
The Summer season invites a plethora of issues like exorbitant electricity billing, sweat, voltage problems, lack of cooling and, whatnot. Our favourite solution often becomes the ceiling fans that save us from heat and maintains a viable working atmosphere for us. Juvas ceiling fans are designed in a manner that addresses all these issues and helps us to maintain peace of mind from the comfort of our homes.

So here we are to give you 5 important reasons to get Juvas ceiling fans this summer :-

1) Optimum performance even at low voltage

Ceiling fans often being the coolest and easiest option during summer becomes a cause of concern due to voltage fluctuations. Juvas ceiling fans are uniquely crafted to address this voltage problem. It builds a strong connection with the customers by delivering optimum performance even during low voltage. Juvas fans once placed at the correct location on the ceiling, offers maximum air delivery even at low voltage conditions. This helps to maintain a comfortable atmosphere for the occupants in the room.

2) Premium design at affordable price

The Price of a product often becomes a determining factor in our decision making. Juvas ceiling fan aims to offer a wide range of premium design fans along with regular models at an economical price. The premium decorative fans namely SENORITA and WYNK are dust resistant with a metallic finish. A highly efficient motor has been incorporated in its structure. It’s compact, durable, and unique. One can also explore the models named PEARL and SIGNA which fall under the decorative fans’ category. The specialty of these fans apart from having 100% Copper Winding, Decorative looks and Anti-Dust facility, these fans are affordable in comparison to the fans available in the market. So now it’s possible to fulfil the dream to get a premium fan on your ceiling easily, efficiently, and economically.

3) Available in dust resistant variant

Summers bring along prickly heat, sweat along with suffocating dusty weather. The dust accumulates in our houses especially on our ceiling fans which increases the heat in the room and affects the freshness of the air in our rooms. It can also lead to infections and dust allergies in some people. To keep our customers happy and healthy, Juvas has designed its ceiling fans which are ANTI-Dust in nature. It does not allow dust to accumulate on its blades and maintains the fresh aroma of the households.

4) High Speed

A ceiling fan with excellent speed is what our heart desires. On a hot summer day when we sit tired and exhausted under a high-speed ceiling fan, it soothes our heated body and our minds escape to the land of happy dreams. Juvas ceiling fans exactly do this. Juvas fans help in escalating the process of perspiration, making the atmosphere in the room soothing and relaxing. It helps us get the maximum air coverage at high speed and provides effective cooling.

5) Value for Money

Juvas ceiling fans help to drive out the stale air from the room and help to circulate fresh air. It helps in cooling as well as controls the humidity in the room. It helps in the evaporation of sweat in a faster and efficient manner. The ceiling fans are long-lasting and exhibit sheer elegance. It’s surely an asset for every customer that he can depend upon.

So this summer don’t forget to get Juvas Ceiling Fan for your home. It’s your best friend for summer.

Juvas Lagaye, AC Bhool Jaaye!
